gw.api.soap

Class SOAPServiceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.soap.SOAPServiceBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChemicalElementAPI, IDataObjectAPI, IGroupAPI, IImportToolsAPI, ILoginAPI, IMaintenanceToolsAPI, IMessagingToolsAPI, IProfilerAPI, IReviewSummaryAPI, ISystemToolsAPI, ITableImportAPI, ITypelistToolsAPI, IUserAPI, IWorkflowAPI, IZoneImportAPI

    public class SOAPServiceBase
extends Object
    Base class for auto generated soap API classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      List<CallHandler> Handlers
      Returns the handlers registered for this service.
      static String PERF_TIMING_REF
      String URL
      Returns the local URL if non-null, otherwise returns the endpoint URL.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SOAPServiceBase(com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.typeloader.SOAPLoader SOAPLoader, String String, QName QName)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGWAuthentication()
      Adds guidewire specific authentication tags to the headers of the soap service. The authentication information is fetched from the endpoint authentication.
      WARNING: This only adds the tags if guidewire authentication was chosen.
      void addHandler(CallHandler handler)
      Call handlers are used to intercept SOAP calls. Two events are provided to intercept the call before it is made or after it has left.
      void setLogging(Logger logger, Priority level)
      Sets the logging for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging. When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.
      void setLoggingOutputStream(PrintStream outputStream)
      Sets the logging output stream for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging. When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addGWAuthentication

        void addGWAuthentication()
        Adds guidewire specific authentication tags to the headers of the soap service. The authentication information is fetched from the endpoint authentication.
        WARNING: This only adds the tags if guidewire authentication was chosen.

      • addHandler

        void addHandler(CallHandler handler)
        Call handlers are used to intercept SOAP calls. Two events are provided to intercept the call before it is made or after it has left.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to add

      • setLogging

        void setLogging(Logger logger,
              Priority level)
        Sets the logging for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging.

        When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.

        Parameters:
        logger - the logger to log to
        level - the log level to log at.

      • setLoggingOutputStream

        void setLoggingOutputStream(PrintStream outputStream)
        Sets the logging output stream for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging.

        When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.

        Parameters:
        outputStream - the stream to log to. Typically java.lang.System.out or java.lang.System.err
